Dear [Candidate],

Thank you for your interest in the position. We appreciate your time and effort in applying for the role. We had an overwhelming number of qualified applicants, and it was a difficult decision. Unfortunately, after careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with another candidate.

We understand that you came in second, and we want to assure you that this was not a reflection of your abilities or the effort you put into your application. We encourage you to apply for other positions within our company and we wish you the best of luck in your job search.

Thank you again for your interest in [Company].

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Company]</s>
